messages.message:
Hi team,
I just pulled the master branch and restarted the services, but the sandbox isn’t working now. It seems like the database connection is failing.
Could someone help me troubleshoot and resolve this issue?
Sandbox link : https://https--pramod1-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/
```2025/05/30 04:39:26 ERROR utils/db/session/dbsession.go:212 -- SQL DB: Failed to parse DB params: Empty DBParam string
2025/05/30 04:39:26 ERROR coreplatformservice/main.go:284 -- Failed to create DBSession: Empty DBParam string
2025/05/30 04:39:26 FATAL coreplatformservice/main.go:372 -- Failed to create DB accessor: Empty DBParam string, Exiting...```
cc : @ayesha.ali

Hey! This looks related to a recent change where the env var responsible for setting the DB string was renamed here - https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1748532522254779.

I've just updated the ibdev-backend template, could you resync your sandbox (without force base image update selected) so that it picks up the template change?

Thanks @Vasu.
I re-synced the sandbox (without force update base) 20 minutes ago, but it’s still not working.

It’s working now after restarting/rebuilding the workspace.
Thank you!
